parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set current (forced <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> false) or permanent (forced <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> true) wind vector.<br>
'''NOTE''': The effect is global only if command is executed on the server. Wind set locally will sync back to server value in a while. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setWind''' [x, y, forced] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [x, y, forced]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> x: [[Number]] Easterly component (in m/s, positive = to the east) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> y: [[Number]] Northerly component (in m/s, positive = to the north) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> forced: [[Boolean]] true: wind constantly blows in set direction, false: wind can change direction (default) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>'''setWind''' [10, 10, true];</code></value></part><part><name/>=<value> EXAMPLE
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[wind]], [[setWindDir]], [[gusts]], [[setGusts]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> mp</name>=<value>Execute on server </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
